title: CNN Runs Gaza Coverage Past Jerusalem Team Operating Under Shadow of IDF Censor
description:
The Jerusalem bureau has long reviewed all CNN stories relating to Israel and Palestine. Now, it’s helping shape the network’s coverage of the war.

The post CNN Runs Gaza Coverage Past Jerusalem Team Operating Under Shadow of IDF Censor appeared first on The Intercept.

title: State Department: Israel “Must Not” Pursue “Mass Displacement Of Palestinians From Gaza”
description:
The comments come as Israeli ministers make increasingly clear their ambition to ethnically cleanse Gaza of Palestinians.

The post State Department: Israel “Must Not” Pursue “Mass Displacement Of Palestinians From Gaza” appeared first on The Intercept.
